law.catch_line: Marriage license valid for thirty days.
law.text: A marriage license shall be valid for thirty (30) days, including the date it is issued, and after that time it shall be invalid.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted as this section 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 159, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2105a-3.
